snippet: Nigeria won its first Africa Cup of Nations title since 1994, beating Burkina Faso, 1-0, on Mba’s left-footed volley in the 40th minute.
abstract: Nigeria defeats Burkina Faso, 1-0, to win its first Africa Cup of Nations soccer title since 1994; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Nigeria won its first Africa Cup of Nations title since 1994, beating Burkina Faso, 1-0, on Mba’s left-footed volley in the 40th minute.

headline.seo: Nigeria Captures First Africa Cup of Nations
headline.main: Nigeria Captures First Africa Cup of Nations
